news.title: Himalayan Glacial Lake Monitoring and Climate Change Adaptation
news.content: Sikkim High Court mandates comprehensive monitoring of glacial lakes and implementation of climate change adaptation strategies to prevent natural disasters in the Himalayan region.

news.title: Organic Farming Certification and Sustainable Agriculture
news.content: The court supports Sikkim's organic farming initiatives by establishing proper certification processes and promoting sustainable agricultural practices across the state.

news.title: Border Trade Regulation and Cross-Border Commerce
news.content: Sikkim High Court provides regulatory framework for border trade with neighboring countries, ensuring security compliance while promoting legitimate cross-border commerce.
